name: BizGreet
overview:
BizGreet powers video ads that change dynamically and instantly to reach each unique viewer with a tailored message.

With BizGreet the transition from broadcast advertising to narrowcast is complete: Rather than creating a single video message that is uniformly distributed to all viewers without any regard of them being part of the target audience for this message, BizGreet allows the real-time tailoring and large-scale delivery of video ads with content assembled exclusively for each viewer, dramatically increasing message relevance and effectiveness.

By personalizing video streams to each viewer based on any available CRM data, social network data, IP location or language information, BizGreet can cut inefficiencies from advertising and ensure that marketing messages are once again truly relevant to every viewer.

BizGreet ads can not only greet a viewer with their name, but also adjust the message delivered based on the viewer’s past purchases, current location, age or gender - and deliver it in their preferred language.

BizGreet videos can be delivered inside the Facebook canvas, played on mobile devices, hosted on any third party website with ease, or be made accessible with PURL hosting.

On the back-end, BizGreet can supply detailed information about viewer behavior - who watched their message, did they follow the call to action, did they share the video with friends. This powerful business intelligence allows BizGreet to offer unsurpassed CPA pricing, ensuring that clients only pay for success in delivering the message to the customer and the customer to the point-of-sale.

milestones.description: BizGreet 2.0 Platform Release - BizGreet releases the next version of its platform for adaptive video, enabling personalized web video hosted anywhere.
